#!/usr/bin/env python
import os import time import sys
version = os.popen("echo $VERSION").read()
print ("Deploying version [%s]" %version)
os.system("kubectl delete deployment countries -n lunatech --ignore-not-found=true") os.system("kubectl run countries -n lunatech --image=212104571535.dkr.ecr.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/countries:%s" %version) os.system("kubectl expose deployment/countries --port=8080 -n lunatech")
time.sleep(120)
pods = os.popen("kubectl get pods -n lunatech | grep -i countries").read() pod = pods.split()[0] state = pods.split()[2]
if state == "Running": print ("Pod [%s] is [%s]" %(pod, state)) sys.exit(0) else: print ("Pod [%s] is [%s]" %(pod, state)) sys.exit(1)
